template.name: Caption asset content updated
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a caption asset's content is updated
template.subject: Caption content was updated

template.name: Caption asset deleted
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a caption asset is deleted
template.subject: Caption asset was deleted

template.name: New Caption Asset Added To Entry
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new caption asset is added to an entry.
template.subject: A new caption file was added [entry name: {entry_name}]
template.body:
Hi,

A new caption file was added to an entry.

Entry ID: {entry_id}
Entry Name: {entry_name}
Caption file name: {file_name}
Caption file language: {language}

template.name: Caption asset language or label changed
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a caption asset's label or language fields are changed
template.subject: Caption asset was changed

template.name: Channel was created
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a new channel is created
template.subject: A new channel was added

template.name: Channel was updated
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when an existing channel is updated
template.subject: Channel was updated

template.name: Comment was added to entry
template.description: Email notification template to be sent to entry creator when a comment is added to his entry.
template.subject: A new comment was added to your video {entry_name}
template.body: A new comment was added to your video {entry_name}.

template.name: Entry Changed
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when an entry metadata changed.

item.description: Entry metadata changed, columns defined in modified_columns parameter

template.subject: [Kaltura] - Entry metadata changed
template.body: Entry with ID {entry_id} NAME {entry_name} metadata changed.

item.description: Entry metadata columns that will trigger the event

template.name: Entry was added to channel
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when entry is added to channel.
template.subject: An entry was added to {category_name}

template.name: Entry Content Replaced
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when an entry content replaced successfully.
template.subject: Your media was replaced successfully
template.body: Your recently replaced media: "{entry_name}", is ready for playback.

template.name: Email Entry Metadata Changed
template.description: Email notification template to be sent when a custom metadata object belonging to an entry changes.
template.subject: Custom Data Changed: {entry_name}/ ID: {entry_id}
